N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.10 - Saddle-mounted vehicles

State Regulations

In an operation in which not more than two motor vehicles
constitute the commodity being transported, the combination of one such
transported vehicle and the transporting vehicle, and two such transported
vehicles and the transporting vehicle, shall be considered a single and double
saddle-mount respectively; provided, however, that: (a) the wheels of no more than one axle or
set of tandem axles of each transported vehicle is on the roadway during the
course of transportation; (b) no
such transported vehicle furnishes any motive power; and
(c) each such transported vehicle is mounted
upon a device designed and constructed so as to be readily dismountable and
which performs the function of a conventional fifth wheel. Notes
